Package edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui

Interface Summary
FilePreviewVisitor A visitor class used to construct Preview Panels.
FileView A FileView is something that displays a file.
FileViewFactory An object that can create new views of a given file, i.e.
TableSelectionChangedListener<T extends Named>  
 

Class Summary
AbstractTableModel<T extends Named> This is an abstract class to store the information in a 2xN table.
CategoryTableModel The data model of the table that displays the tags matching the current query and selects which ones should be used for filtering.
FileDisplayPanel A GUI elements that provides a user interface for the underlying file
FileImportCell These are laid out in a grid on the ImportPanel.
FilePreviewFactory Factory to create FilePreviewPanels.
FilePreviewFactory.PreviewConstructor A visitor class used to construct Preview Panels.
FileViewManager A class that knows about where different files are displayed.
FullFilePanel Displays the entire file, not including scrollbars, etc needed to view the whole file depending what type of file it is.
FullFilePanelFactory Factory class for producing panels that display an entire file.
ImportDialog The dialog the user sees after they have selected files and before they are fully imported.
ImportManager This class manages the import process.
ImportPanel GUI element that houses all the components needed to import a set of files into a Biblio library.
MainWindow The main window that contains the interface to Biblio
PreviewPanel Displays a preview of thumbnail of a file.
PropertiesPanel Interface to display a list of the properties associated with a file
PropertiesWindowFactory A class that creates the Properties windows for all the files.
PropertiesWindowFactory.PropertiesFrame A window that contains a PropertiesPanel and removes the view from the manager when it is closed.
ScrollFilePanel A Panel that contains scrollbars so that entire files will fit on screen.
SearchPanel Provides the UI to search.
SearchResultsPreviewPanel This is the body of the full-window search interface.
SortedListModel<T extends Comparable<? super T>> A ListModel (for JLists) that is an Adapter for List.
TagEditorFrame Provides the functionality needed to get the user input to edit tags.
TagEditorListModel A ListModel that displays all of the Tag names (in the EditorPanel).
TagsListPanel Automatically recognizes tags that are entered in and converts the string to an atomic entity.
TagTableModel The data model of the table that displays the tags matching the current query and selects which ones should be used for filtering.
WatcherImportDialog The dialog the user sees when there are new files in the folder that biblio is watching
WatcherImportPanel GUI element that present newly created file in watching directory for user to select and import
WatcherSelectorDialog The dialog the user sees when there are new files in the folder that biblio is watching
WatcherSelectorPanel GUI element that present newly created file in watching directory for user to select and import
 

Enum Summary
CopyStatus The choices a user has for how to store a file when importing
SearchMode The different modes to search through the Biblio infrastructure
